description:
The Star Force escapes the whirlpools, only to be attacked by Galman planes sent in by SMITE (matter teleporation equipment). Dagon lures the Argo to the edge of a black hole, and attempts to drag it in with tractor beams from ships positioned arouund the hole`s rim. The Galman ships end up being pulled in instead.
[Source: The Wave Motion Web Page http://www.desslok.com]

titles.title: Star Force Faces Danger At Cygnus
Yamato Ayaushi! Ma no Hakuchouza Seiiki
ヤマト危し! 魔の白鳥座星域
